data.title: Saudi ruling puts end to marriage between 90-year-old man and his 15-year-old bride
The world's population could actually start declining.
A Chinese Web censor snaps, goes on public rant

World population may actually start declining, not exploding. "the rate of global population growth has slowed. And it’s expected to keep slowing...according to experts’ best estimates, the total population of Earth will stop growing within the lifespan of people alive today. And then it will fall"

Australia's Attorney General in battle with the nation's media over new anti-discrimination laws which would make it illegal to offend or insult a person. A TV station has already had to defend in court it's right to broadcast a documentary on the Armenian genocide because it is offensive.
Police investigating murder on UK nuclear submarine horrified by tales of crew's binge drinking

After Bluefin Tuna Sells for £1m Conservationists Warn Species is Dying Out -  Bluefin tuna are in danger of "all but disappearing", according to a new report, despite a decade long fight to save the "tiger of the seas".
Catholic Church in Germany drops sex abuse inquiry
Former FBI agent missing in Iran photographed in Guantánamo jumpsuit
Australian wildfires are 'nearly uncontrollable' : 'rated catastrophic' in some areas
